Description.UIName: Permanent Contract for Medium Mortar Turret Airdrop
Description.Name: Permanent Contract for Medium Mortar Turret Airdrop
Description.Details: This is a permanent contract for purchasing the right to airdrop a Medium Mortar Turret. Purchasing this contract will permit the option to field Medium Mortar Turrets using a Turret Airdrop. This contract is permanent and does not expire. Hold Shift when deploying the airdrop ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
